turns your crypto assets into reality and makes them part of everyday life

Chek is a platform that allows a crypto community to use discounts or make purchases in 150,000 stores and services, united by a new generation loyalty program. We create a bridge between digital assets and the real world.

How Chek works

In 90 seconds mvp is ready

Discount from the base cost

Chek is the first to use the synergy of millions of people that donate to charity and working loyalty ecosystem.

Ready-to-launch loyalty system unites more than 150,000 small and large networked retail businesses in Europe, Russia and Southeast Asia.

Multi-million and constantly growing in number base of Charity Blockchain Association donors is highly sought by retail businesses, interested in maintaining a socially positive image and inflow of customers.

Why Chek is breakthrough blockchain project

For cryptomarket

Chek creates a platform for crypto asset owners to use crypto currencies as discounts and bonuses in the existing retail and wholesale infrastructure of trade and services.

How Chek works

In 90 seconds
Why blockchain

For retail

Chek allows you to convert crypto assets into universal loyalty points. This allows the retail to attract thousands of customers from the crypto community.

For retailers, this is an opportunity to gain access to an already existing solvent customer community of 1 million people, with the potential for growth of up to 1.5 billion people, provided by the project partner, Charity Blockchain Association (CBA).

Participants benefits

  • Crypto industry

    Gets the ability to turn crypto assets into real goods and up to 1.5 billion participants from the social sector

  • Business

    Receives up to 1.5 billion customers from the charitable sector and the status of socially responsible

  • Charity

    Gets the additional financial flow and trust of the donors for the cuch(?) Blockchain

Why do you need Chek?

Chek allows you to easily convert crypto assets into discounts and purchases, save money by purchasing real goods and services. Token owners are given a new dimension of freedom in using their digital savings.

As the number of participants in the retail loyalty program grows, Chek owners will have more bonuses and discounts available.

Due to the scalability built into the project, the demand for each Chek token will grow in proportion to the growth of the loyalty system.

  • Illegal of crypto currency

    In many countries, the use of crypto currency for the purchase of something is expressly prohibited

  • High costs

    Sellers who trade for digital currencies often overprice or take inappropriate commissions when buying, and complex schemes delay the purchase and increase the likelihood of failures.

  • Limited opportunities

    The number of sites where you can use crypto assets for purchases, is small, and the offer is limited.

  • Loyalty systems

    Loyalty systems are completely legal in all jurisdictions and allow you to purchase goods and services at a significant discount. A single loyalty point and the social component of loyalty gives the system a global coverage.

  • Blockchain system

    The blockchain system allows to convert crypto assets into Chek at high speed, and the received bonuses can be used "here and now" at any point of the retail participating in the program.

  • More than 150K retail sites

    The number of retail sites participating in the loyalty program already exceeds the 150K mark and will only grow.

Turning crypto assets into discounts

  • Simple Scheme
  • Full Scheme
  • Check in White Paper
  • The customer initiates exchange of crypto-currencies for tokens (points) through Charity Blockchain Association (CBA)
  • CBA accrues tokens (points) to the customer
  • The customer comes to the store to buy and pays the points

Создание Chek

Cheks появляются в момент пожертвований в благотворительный фонд

Базовое распределение Cheks

One⁺¹ начисляет Cheks благотворительным фондам и жертвователям. Если товар приобретается на площадке One⁺¹ или на аналогичных сервисах, Cheks получают также покупатели и площадка

  • Благотворительные фонды

  • Жертвователи

  • Покупатели

Благотворительный фонд отчисляет 30% поступлений в Фонд развития социальных инициатив на Blockchain

30%

  • Фонд развития социальных инициатив на Blockchain

    Фондом управляют основные владельцы Cheks — инвесторы и благотворительные фонды

  • Журналисты получают Cheks за лучшие статьи/эфиры про благотворительность и Blockchain

  • Бизнес получает Cheks за подключение к экосистеме One⁺¹

  • Социальные благотворительные проекты

  • Разработчики ПО получают Cheks за участие в развитии экосистемы

Documents

perspective

Charity Blockchain Association (CBA) unites hundreds of charitable foundations around the world. The main task of the association is the introduction of a new management system for charitable assets, based on Blockchain technologies. For the Chek project, CBA acts as the source of the customer base. CBA infrastructure include charitable marketplace One⁺¹

  • Go to BCA
  • Source code at GitHub

  • The Best Social Project 2017

  • 1000+ partners foundations

MVP

The loyalty program is based on the client network of 2can company, as well as the Charity Blockchain Association

Go to App Page

2can is the market leader in mPos acquiring and payment solutions. It unites more than 150 thousand outlets.

  • $1B Annual Turn Over
